Name: Void Surfer
About the game: Overview Captain your very own, custom built spacecraft. You will gather materials, new technologies, and allies in hopes to ultimately win the battle for the universe. Story Mode As one of the last surviving Void Surfers, you are a protector of the galaxy. You must find a way to quell the evil overlord Ironfowl and his forces. Customize your ship to your liking Help the inhabitants of the galaxy with various requests Discover new unique solar systems with different themes Unlock powerful and interesting modules for your ship Defeat the forces of Ironfowl Power Struggle Mode Go head to head with an enemy commander in a battle for supremacy over an entire solar system Upgrade your own ship as well as your own personal fleet Capture planets for various advantages Capture all of the planets to win! Survival Mode Test your ship building and combat proficiency as waves of increasingly powerful enemies seek to destroy you. Can you hold out till the end?
